alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun and central Orangeburg Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orangeburg County Airport, or 8 miles south of Orangeburg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Bowman, Elloree, Orangeburg County Airport, Edisto Gardens, Rowesville, Cordova, Wilkinson Heights, Edisto and Yonder Field. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 150 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
